on reading compounds: 推敲【スイコウ】polishing (e.g. essay), revision, elaboration, refinement, improvement
月下推敲【ゲッカスイコウ】polish, elaboration, repeatedly working over one's writing, being very scrupulous in the choice of diction
kun reading compounds: 叩く【たたく】to strike, to clap, to knock, to beat, to tap, to pat, to play drums, to abuse, to bash, to flame (e.g. on the Internet), to insult, to consult, to sound out, to brag, to talk big, to call, to invoke (e.g. a function)
